dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5452 IH: Reduce Unemployment for Veterans of All Ages Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley of California (for herself, Mr. Crowley, Mr. Gallego, Mr. Takano, Mr. Kilmer, and Ms. Vel√°zquez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the period of eligibility for the Vocational Rehabilitation and Employment program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Reduce Unemployment for Veterans of All Ages Act of 2018.

subsection.text: Section 3103 of title 38, United States Code, is repealed.
The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 31 of such title is amended by striking the item relating to section 3103.
